dublin_core.dcvalue: Telepsychiatry or videoconferencing in psychiatry has existed for around forty years in a number of countries Factors contributing to its development include difficulties in physically accessing specialists or in mobilising certain categories of patients children elderly or disabled people Still not widely developed in France certain technological and demographic evolutions nevertheless make it increasingly necessary
Soins; la revue de référence infirmière
[Telepsychiatry, the potential to live up to its promise].
